&lt;number of bytes loaded&gt;</div><div>- cursor := max(cursor, begin)</div><div>- eof := begin == end</div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" target="rGDfIxyqO-xqNPur0uly-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="414" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="90" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KeGy-grUWBUlTdqt3JzT-4" value="" style="ellipse;html=1;shape=startState;fillColor=#000000;strokeColor=#ff0000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="399" y="-20" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KeGy-grUWBUlTdqt3JzT-12" value="" style="ellipse;html=1;shape=endState;fillColor=#000000;strokeColor=#ff0000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="518" y="260" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KeGy-grUWBUlTdqt3JzT-25" value="" style="ellipse;html=1;shape=endState;fillColor=#000000;strokeColor=#ff0000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="620" y="690" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="KeGy-grUWBUlTdqt3JzT-28" value="" style="ellipse;html=1;shape=endState;fillColor=#000000;strokeColor=#ff0000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="490" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="874ZllUWTWSgnYW9UKUH-31" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">StreamLineReader Algorithm</h1><div>Returns the position in a given stream where the line begins, along with its length.</div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-40" y="-30" width="350" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="874ZllUWTWSgnYW9UKUH-32" value="<p style=""><font face="Helvetica"><b>Input:</b><br><span style="background-color: initial;">- stream<br></span></font><span style="background-color: initial;">- bufferSize</span></p><p></p>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=bottom;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="-40" y="90" width="90" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="874ZllUWTWSgnYW9UKUH-33" value="<p style=""><span style="background-color: initial;"><b>State:<br></b></span><span style="background-color: initial;">- buffer<br></span><span style="background-color: initial;">- begin, end<br></span><span style="background-color: initial;">- cursor<br></span><span style="background-color: initial;">- lineBegin</span></p>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=bottom;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="90" width="100" height="90" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="874ZllUWTWSgnYW9UKUH-35" value="<p style=""><span style="background-color: initial;"><b>Output:<br></b></span><span style="background-color: initial;">- line begin<br></span><span style="background-color: initial;">- line length</span></p>" style="text;html=1;align=left;verticalAlign=bottom;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="150" y="75" width="70" height="75" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div:
- result := (lineBegin, foundPos - lineBegin)
- lineBegin := foundPos + 1 (+2 if \r\n)
- cursor := lineBegin

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 238px; height: 1px; padding-top: 470px; margin-left: 399px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Load new buffer
- begin := end
- end := begin + <number of bytes loaded>
- cursor := max(cursor, begin)
- eof := begin == end
